pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 10  $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() $(br)ranged: 5, $(br)contact: 4 on easy, 6 on normal, 9 on hard $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Hostile     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Nether Fortress  $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)If a $(thing)Blaze$() is damaged by a $(thing)Player$() or other mob, it alerts other $(thing)Blazes$() within 48 blocks to target the attacker. They can fly, shoot fire balls and is taking damage from $(item)Water$() and $(item)Snowballs$().
